# Rasterization

  • Primitive-by-primitive ë°©ì‹

    • primitive ì˜ˆì‹œ: triangle, line, point ë“±
    • ê° primitiveëŠ” ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ë‚´ ì–´ëŠ í”½ì…€ì— ì˜í–¥ì„ ë¯¸ì¹˜ëŠ”ì§€ë¥¼ ê²°ì •í•˜ê³  í•´ë‹¹ í”½ì…€ì˜ ìƒ‰ì„ ì„¤ì •í•¨
for each primitive in scene
  transform the primitive to viewport
  find pixels for the primitive
  set color of the pixels based on texture and lighting model
  • ì˜ˆì‹œ: ì‚¼ê°í˜• í•˜ë‚˜ê°€ í™”ë©´ì— ë Œë”ë§ë¨

# Rasterization Pipeline

  • ì£¼ìš” ë‹¨ê³„:

    • Vertex Processing

      • vertexë¥¼ screen spaceë¡œ ë³€í™˜

    • Primitive Processing

      • vertexë“¤ì„ polygonìœ¼ë¡œ êµ¬ì„±

    • Scan Conversion

      • polygonì„ fragment ì§‘í•©ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€í™˜

    • Fragment Processing

      • ê° fragmentì˜ ìƒ‰ìƒ ê²°ì • (í…ìŠ¤ì²˜, ì¡°ëª… ëª¨ë¸ ë“± ê³ ë ¤)

    • Per-sample Operations

      • depth test, alpha blending ë“± ìˆ˜í–‰

  • í”íˆ rendering pipeline ë˜ëŠ” graphics pipelineì´ë¼ ë¶€ë¦„

# Rendering Pipeline again

  • ì…ë ¥: ê° ì˜¤ë¸Œì íŠ¸ ê³µê°„ì˜ vertex

  • ì²˜ë¦¬ ìˆœì„œ:

    • screen spaceì˜ vertex
    • screen spaceì˜ primitive
    • pixelë‹¹ í•˜ë‚˜ ì´ìƒì˜ fragment
    • ìƒ‰ìƒ ê³„ì‚°ëœ shaded fragments
    • ìµœì¢… ì¶œë ¥: image

# Ray Tracing

  • Pixel-by-pixel ë°©ì‹

  • ì¹´ë©”ë¼ ìœ„ì¹˜ì—ì„œ image plane ìƒì˜ ê° í”½ì…€ì„ í†µê³¼í•˜ëŠ” rayë¥¼ ìƒì„±

  • í•´ë‹¹ rayê°€ ì–´ë–¤ ì˜¤ë¸Œì íŠ¸ì™€ êµì°¨í•˜ëŠ”ì§€ì— ë”°ë¼ í”½ì…€ì˜ ìƒ‰ìƒì´ ê²°ì •ë¨

for each pixel in image(plane)
  determine which object should be shown at the pixel
  set color of the pixel based on texture and lighting model
  • ì˜ˆì‹œ: ray êµì°¨ ê²°ê³¼ê°€ í™”ë©´ì— ë Œë”ë§ë¨
